00051 #include "youbot/YouBotBase.hpp"

00053 
00054 YouBotBase::YouBotBase(const std::string name, const std::string configFilePath)
00055 : ethercatMaster(EthercatMaster::getInstance("youbot-ethercat.cfg", configFilePath)) {
00056   // Bouml preserved body begin 00067E71
00057 
00058     this->controllerType = 174;
00059     this->alternativeControllerType = 1632;
00060     this->minFirmwareVersion = 1.48;
00061 
00062     string filename;
00063     filename = name;
00064     filename.append(".cfg");
00065 
00066     configfile.reset(new ConfigFile(filename, configFilePath));
00067     
00068     this->initializeJoints();
00069 
00070     this->initializeKinematic();
00071 
00072   // Bouml preserved body end 00067E71
00073 }
00074 
00075 YouBotBase::~YouBotBase() {
00076   // Bouml preserved body begin 00067EF1
00077   // Bouml preserved body end 00067EF1
00078 }
00079 
00080 ///does the sine commutation of the base joints
00081 void YouBotBase::doJointCommutation() {
00082   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008A9F1
00083 
00084     InitializeJoint doInitialization;
00085     bool isInitialized = false;
00086     int noInitialization = 0;
00087 
00088     ClearMotorControllerTimeoutFlag clearTimeoutFlag;
00089     this->getBaseJoint(1).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00090     this->getBaseJoint(2).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00091     this->getBaseJoint(3).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00092     this->getBaseJoint(4).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00093 
00094 
00095     if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00096       ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00097       ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00098     }
00099 
00100     doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00101     this->getBaseJoint(1).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00102     doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00103     if (!isInitialized) {
00104       noInitialization++;
00105     }
00106 
00107     doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00108     this->getBaseJoint(2).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00109     doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00110     if (!isInitialized) {
00111       noInitialization++;
00112     }
00113 
00114     doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00115     this->getBaseJoint(3).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00116     doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00117     if (!isInitialized) {
00118       noInitialization++;
00119     }
00120 
00121     doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00122     this->getBaseJoint(4).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00123     doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00124     if (!isInitialized) {
00125       noInitialization++;
00126     }
00127 
00128     if (noInitialization != 0) {
00129       doInitialization.setParameter(true);
00130       LOG(info) << "Base Joint Commutation";
00131 
00132       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00133       this->getBaseJoint(1).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00134       this->getBaseJoint(2).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00135       this->getBaseJoint(3).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00136       this->getBaseJoint(4).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00137       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00138 
00139       unsigned int statusFlags;
00140       std::vector<bool> isCommutated;
00141       isCommutated.assign(BASEJOINTS, false);
00142       unsigned int u = 0;
00143 
00144       // check for the next 5 sec if the joints are commutated
00145       for (u = 1; u <= 5000; u++) {
00146         for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= BASEJOINTS; i++) {
00147           if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00148               ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00149               ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00150           }
00151           this->getBaseJoint(i).getStatus(statusFlags);
00152           if (statusFlags & INITIALIZED) {
00153             isCommutated[i - 1] = true;
00154           }
00155         }
00156         if (isCommutated[0] && isCommutated[1] && isCommutated[2] && isCommutated[3]) {
00157           break;
00158         }
00159         SLEEP_MILLISEC(1);
00160       }
00161 
00162 
00163       SLEEP_MILLISEC(10); // the controller likes it
00164       std::string jointName;
00165 
00166       for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= BASEJOINTS; i++) {
00167         doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00168         this->getBaseJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00169         doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00170         if (!isInitialized) {
00171           std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00172           jointNameStream << "joint " << i;
00173           jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00174           throw std::runtime_error("Could not commutate base " + jointName);
00175         }
00176       }
00177     }
00178   // Bouml preserved body end 0008A9F1
00179 }
00180 
00181 ///return a joint form the base
00182 ///@param baseJointNumber 1-4 for the base joints
00183 YouBotJoint& YouBotBase::getBaseJoint(const unsigned int baseJointNumber) {
00184   // Bouml preserved body begin 0004F771
00185     if (baseJointNumber <= 0 || baseJointNumber > BASEJOINTS) {
00186       throw std::out_of_range("Invalid Joint Number");
00187     }
00188     return joints[baseJointNumber - 1];
00189   // Bouml preserved body end 0004F771
00190 }
00191 
00192 ///gets the cartesien base position which is calculated from the odometry
00193 ///@param longitudinalPosition is the forward or backward position
00194 ///@param transversalPosition is the sideway position
00195 ///@param orientation is the rotation around the center of the YouBot
00196 void YouBotBase::getBasePosition(quantity<si::length>& longitudinalPosition, quantity<si::length>& transversalPosition, quantity<plane_angle>& orientation) {
00197   // Bouml preserved body begin 000514F1
00198 
00199     std::vector<quantity<plane_angle> > wheelPositions;
00200     quantity<plane_angle> dummy;
00201     JointSensedAngle sensedPos;
00202     wheelPositions.assign(BASEJOINTS, dummy);
00203 
00204     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00205     joints[0].getData(sensedPos);
00206     wheelPositions[0] = sensedPos.angle;
00207     joints[1].getData(sensedPos);
00208     wheelPositions[1] = sensedPos.angle;
00209     joints[2].getData(sensedPos);
00210     wheelPositions[2] = sensedPos.angle;
00211     joints[3].getData(sensedPos);
00212     wheelPositions[3] = sensedPos.angle;
00213     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00214 
00215     youBotBaseKinematic.wheelPositionsToCartesianPosition(wheelPositions, longitudinalPosition, transversalPosition, orientation);
00216   // Bouml preserved body end 000514F1
00217 }
00218 
00219 ///sets the cartesien base position
00220 ///@param longitudinalPosition is the forward or backward position
00221 ///@param transversalPosition is the sideway position
00222 ///@param orientation is the rotation around the center of the YouBot
00223 void YouBotBase::setBasePosition(const quantity<si::length>& longitudinalPosition, const quantity<si::length>& transversalPosition, const quantity<plane_angle>& orientation) {
00224   // Bouml preserved body begin 000C0971
00225 
00226     std::vector<quantity<plane_angle> > wheelPositions;
00227     quantity<plane_angle> dummy;
00228     JointAngleSetpoint setpointPos;
00229     wheelPositions.assign(BASEJOINTS, dummy);
00230     JointSensedAngle sensedPos;
00231 
00232     youBotBaseKinematic.cartesianPositionToWheelPositions(longitudinalPosition, transversalPosition, orientation, wheelPositions);
00233     
00234     if (wheelPositions.size() < BASEJOINTS)
00235       throw std::out_of_range("To less wheel velocities");
00236     
00237     joints[0].setEncoderToZero();
00238     joints[1].setEncoderToZero();
00239     joints[2].setEncoderToZero();
00240     joints[3].setEncoderToZero();
00241     SLEEP_MILLISEC(10);
00242 
00243     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00244     joints[0].getData(sensedPos);
00245     setpointPos.angle = sensedPos.angle + wheelPositions[0];
00246     joints[0].setData(setpointPos, NON_BLOCKING);
00247     
00248     joints[1].getData(sensedPos);
00249     setpointPos.angle = sensedPos.angle + wheelPositions[1];
00250     joints[1].setData(setpointPos, NON_BLOCKING);
00251     
00252     joints[2].getData(sensedPos);
00253     setpointPos.angle = sensedPos.angle + wheelPositions[2];
00254     joints[2].setData(setpointPos, NON_BLOCKING);
00255     
00256     joints[3].getData(sensedPos);
00257     setpointPos.angle = sensedPos.angle + wheelPositions[3];
00258     joints[3].setData(setpointPos, NON_BLOCKING);
00259     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00260 
00261   // Bouml preserved body end 000C0971
00262 }
00263 
00264 ///gets the cartesien base velocity
00265 ///@param longitudinalVelocity is the forward or backward velocity
00266 ///@param transversalVelocity is the sideway velocity
00267 ///@param angularVelocity is the rotational velocity around the center of the YouBot
00268 void YouBotBase::getBaseVelocity(quantity<si::velocity>& longitudinalVelocity, quantity<si::velocity>& transversalVelocity, quantity<si::angular_velocity>& angularVelocity) {
00269   // Bouml preserved body begin 00051271
00270 
00271     std::vector<quantity<angular_velocity> > wheelVelocities;
00272     quantity<angular_velocity> dummy;
00273     JointSensedVelocity sensedVel;
00274     wheelVelocities.assign(BASEJOINTS, dummy);
00275 
00276     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00277     joints[0].getData(sensedVel);
00278     wheelVelocities[0] = sensedVel.angularVelocity;
00279     joints[1].getData(sensedVel);
00280     wheelVelocities[1] = sensedVel.angularVelocity;
00281     joints[2].getData(sensedVel);
00282     wheelVelocities[2] = sensedVel.angularVelocity;
00283     joints[3].getData(sensedVel);
00284     wheelVelocities[3] = sensedVel.angularVelocity;
00285     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00286 
00287     youBotBaseKinematic.wheelVelocitiesToCartesianVelocity(wheelVelocities, longitudinalVelocity, transversalVelocity, angularVelocity);
00288 
00289   // Bouml preserved body end 00051271
00290 }
00291 
00292 ///commands the base in cartesien velocities
00293 ///@param longitudinalVelocity is the forward or backward velocity
00294 ///@param transversalVelocity is the sideway velocity
00295 ///@param angularVelocity is the rotational velocity around the center of the YouBot
00296 void YouBotBase::setBaseVelocity(const quantity<si::velocity>& longitudinalVelocity, const quantity<si::velocity>& transversalVelocity, const quantity<si::angular_velocity>& angularVelocity) {
00297   // Bouml preserved body begin 0004DD71
00298 
00299     std::vector<quantity<angular_velocity> > wheelVelocities;
00300     JointVelocitySetpoint setVel;
00301 
00302     youBotBaseKinematic.cartesianVelocityToWheelVelocities(longitudinalVelocity, transversalVelocity, angularVelocity, wheelVelocities);
00303 
00304     if (wheelVelocities.size() < BASEJOINTS)
00305       throw std::out_of_range("To less wheel velocities");
00306 
00307     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00308     setVel.angularVelocity = wheelVelocities[0];
00309     joints[0].setData(setVel, NON_BLOCKING);
00310     setVel.angularVelocity = wheelVelocities[1];
00311     joints[1].setData(setVel, NON_BLOCKING);
00312     setVel.angularVelocity = wheelVelocities[2];
00313     joints[2].setData(setVel, NON_BLOCKING);
00314     setVel.angularVelocity = wheelVelocities[3];
00315     joints[3].setData(setVel, NON_BLOCKING);
00316     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00317   // Bouml preserved body end 0004DD71
00318 }
00319 
00320 ///commands positions or angles to all base joints
00321 ///all positions will be set at the same time
00322 ///@param JointData the to command positions
00323 void YouBotBase::setJointData(const std::vector<JointAngleSetpoint>& JointData) {
00324   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008F9F1
00325     if (JointData.size() != BASEJOINTS)
00326       throw std::out_of_range("Wrong number of JointAngleSetpoints");
00327 
00328     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00329     joints[0].setData(JointData[0], NON_BLOCKING);
00330     joints[1].setData(JointData[1], NON_BLOCKING);
00331     joints[2].setData(JointData[2], NON_BLOCKING);
00332     joints[3].setData(JointData[3], NON_BLOCKING);
00333     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00334 
00335   // Bouml preserved body end 0008F9F1
00336 }
00337 
00338 ///gets the position or angle of all base joints which have been calculated from the actual encoder value
00339 ///These values are all read at the same time from the different joints 
00340 ///@param data returns the angles by reference
00341 void YouBotBase::getJointData(std::vector<JointSensedAngle>& data) {
00342   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FBF1
00343     data.resize(BASEJOINTS);
00344     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00345     joints[0].getData(data[0]);
00346     joints[1].getData(data[1]);
00347     joints[2].getData(data[2]);
00348     joints[3].getData(data[3]);
00349     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00350   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FBF1
00351 }

00353 ///commands velocities to all base joints
00354 ///all velocities will be set at the same time
00355 ///@param JointData the to command velocities
00356 void YouBotBase::setJointData(const std::vector<JointVelocitySetpoint>& JointData) {
00357   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FA71
00358     if (JointData.size() != BASEJOINTS)
00359       throw std::out_of_range("Wrong number of JointVelocitySetpoints");
00360 
00361     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00362     joints[0].setData(JointData[0], NON_BLOCKING);
00363     joints[1].setData(JointData[1], NON_BLOCKING);
00364     joints[2].setData(JointData[2], NON_BLOCKING);
00365     joints[3].setData(JointData[3], NON_BLOCKING);
00366     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00367   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FA71
00368 }

00449 bool YouBotBase::areSame(const double A, const double B) {
00450   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A6971
00451     return std::fabs(A - B) < 0.0001;
00452   // Bouml preserved body end 000A6971
00453 }
00454 
00455 void YouBotBase::initializeJoints() {
00456   // Bouml preserved body begin 000464F1
00457 
00458     LOG(trace) << "Initializing Joints";
00459 
00460     //get number of slaves
00461     unsigned int noSlaves = ethercatMaster.getNumberOfSlaves();
00462 
00463     if (noSlaves < BASEJOINTS) {
00464       throw std::out_of_range("Not enough ethercat slaves were found to create a YouBotBase!");
00465     }
00466 
00467     //read Joint Topology from config file
00468     //  configfile.setSection("JointTopology");
00469 
00470     //check if enough slave exist to create YouBotJoint for the slave numbers from config file
00471     //if enough slave exist create YouBotJoint and store it in the joints vector
00472     unsigned int slaveNumber = 0;
00473     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "BaseLeftFront");
00474     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00475       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00476     } else {
00477       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00478     }
00479 
00480     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "BaseRightFront");
00481     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00482       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00483     } else {
00484       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00485     }
00486 
00487     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "BaseLeftBack");
00488     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00489       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00490     } else {
00491       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00492     }
00493 
00494     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "BaseRightBack");
00495     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00496       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00497     } else {
00498       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00499     }
00500 
00501 
00502     //Configure Joint Parameters
00503     std::string jointName;
00504     JointName jName;
00505     GearRatio gearRatio;
00506     EncoderTicksPerRound ticksPerRound;
00507     InverseMovementDirection inverseDir;
00508     FirmwareVersion firmwareTypeVersion;
00509     TorqueConstant torqueConst;
00510 
00511     double gearRatio_numerator = 0;
00512     double gearRatio_denominator = 1;
00513     JointLimits jLimits;
00514 
00515     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < BASEJOINTS; i++) {
00516       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00517       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00518       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00519       //  configfile.setSection(jointName.c_str());
00520 
00521       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(firmwareTypeVersion);
00522       std::string version;
00523       int controllerType;
00524       double firmwareVersion;
00525       firmwareTypeVersion.getParameter(controllerType, firmwareVersion);
00526 
00527       string name;
00528       configfile->readInto(name, jointName, "JointName");
00529       jName.setParameter(name);
00530 
00531       LOG(info) << name << "\t Controller Type: " << controllerType << "  Firmware version: " << firmwareVersion;
00532 
00533       if (this->controllerType != controllerType && alternativeControllerType != controllerType) {
00534         std::stringstream ss;
00535         ss << "The youBot base motor controller have to be of type: " << this->controllerType << " or " << alternativeControllerType;
00536         throw std::runtime_error(ss.str().c_str());
00537       }
00538 
00539       if (!areSame(firmwareVersion, this->minFirmwareVersion)) {
00540         if (firmwareVersion < this->minFirmwareVersion) {
00541           std::stringstream ss;
00542           ss << "The motor controller firmware version have be " << this->minFirmwareVersion << " or higher.";
00543           throw std::runtime_error(ss.str().c_str());
00544         }
00545       }
00546 
00547 
00548       configfile->readInto(gearRatio_numerator, jointName, "GearRatio_numerator");
00549       configfile->readInto(gearRatio_denominator, jointName, "GearRatio_denominator");
00550       gearRatio.setParameter(gearRatio_numerator / gearRatio_denominator);
00551       int ticks;
00552       configfile->readInto(ticks, jointName, "EncoderTicksPerRound");
00553       ticksPerRound.setParameter(ticks);
00554       
00555       double torqueConstant;
00556       configfile->readInto(torqueConstant, jointName, "TorqueConstant_[newton_meter_divided_by_ampere]");
00557       torqueConst.setParameter(torqueConstant);
00558       
00559       bool invdir = false;
00560       configfile->readInto(invdir, jointName, "InverseMovementDirection");
00561       inverseDir.setParameter(invdir);
00562 
00563       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(jName);
00564       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(gearRatio);
00565       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(ticksPerRound);
00566       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(torqueConst);
00567       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(inverseDir);
00568    
00569       long upperlimit = 0, lowerlimit = 0;
00570       configfile->readInto(lowerlimit, jointName, "LowerLimit_[encoderTicks]");
00571       configfile->readInto(upperlimit, jointName, "UpperLimit_[encoderTicks]");
00572 
00573       jLimits.setParameter(lowerlimit, upperlimit, false);
00574       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(jLimits);
00575     }
00576 
00577     return;
00578   // Bouml preserved body end 000464F1
00579 }
00580 
00581 void YouBotBase::initializeKinematic() {
00582   // Bouml preserved body begin 0004DDF1
00583     FourSwedishWheelOmniBaseKinematicConfiguration kinematicConfig;
00584 
00585     //read the kinematics parameter from a config file
00586     configfile->readInto(kinematicConfig.rotationRatio, "YouBotKinematic", "RotationRatio");
00587     configfile->readInto(kinematicConfig.slideRatio, "YouBotKinematic", "SlideRatio");
00588     double dummy = 0;
00589     configfile->readInto(dummy, "YouBotKinematic", "LengthBetweenFrontAndRearWheels_[meter]");
00590     kinematicConfig.lengthBetweenFrontAndRearWheels = dummy * meter;
00591     configfile->readInto(dummy, "YouBotKinematic", "LengthBetweenFrontWheels_[meter]");
00592     kinematicConfig.lengthBetweenFrontWheels = dummy * meter;
00593     configfile->readInto(dummy, "YouBotKinematic", "WheelRadius_[meter]");
00594     kinematicConfig.wheelRadius = dummy * meter;
00595 
00596 
00597     youBotBaseKinematic.setConfiguration(kinematicConfig);
00598   // Bouml preserved body end 0004DDF1
00599 }
